upmc.ll.yourdata.deleteregistration.text:
You can delete your user account via the link below. Please note that deletion will deactivate all services in your vehicles and all co-user rights will be withdrawn. Alternatively, you can also request your cancellation by phone via our call centre:

Phone number: 080-001-1886 – Select number “1-inquiries about the car” and then select number “4-Mercedes me connect support”
